item.description:
The hike is a one-way along the rail bed between Pocasset and the Cape Cod railroad bridge.

Meet us at the Hacienda for breakfast at 8:30 or be at the parking lot in Pocasset center on Barlow's Landing Road by 9:45. We'll park in the lot beside the railroad tracks facing the fire station and follow the tracks north to the railroad bridge. (We will have to drop car(s) at the Cape Cod Railroad Bridge, depending on the signup. Two or more of us will have to leave breakfast early to get back to the start by 9:45. We will figure this out at breakfast.)

There are a number of really scenic spots along the route. The hike is about 4 miles. Bring water, snacks, good shoes, bug spray, etc.

CJ was a little under the weather and requests that we meet at the Hacienda since she is not sure she will be better.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Pocasset rail (trail)
